name: The Sea Explorer
summary: Exploring the jaw-dropping Mount Kenya slopes by foot
description: This 5-day hike offers a spectacular and scenic way to ascend Mt. Kenya, starting from Chogoria and culminating at the summit before descending via the Sirimon Route. This journey begins in vibrant montane forests, where climbers can enjoy unique flora and fauna, including giant trees and colorful bird species. As the ascent progresses, the landscape transitions to moorland, revealing stunning views of the peaks and glaciers.
